all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Thy voice shall be a rebuke unto the transgressor; and at thy rebuke let the tongue of the slanderer cease its perverseness.
Doctrine and Covenants 112:9
Quote of the Day
"Our preparation to meet Jesus Christ accelerates when we stop asking what God will permit and start asking what God would prefer."
Elder Steven D. Shumway | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
